<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:ws:verifier:v1_0" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:ws:verifier:v1_0" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:sch4="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:domain:verifier:v1_0" xmlns:sch3="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:domain:common:v1_0" xmlns:sch2="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:sch1="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:sch0="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:ws:verifier:v1_0"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:ws:verifier:v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:verifier="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:domain:verifier:v1_0" xmlns:common="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:domain:common:v1_0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Verifier specific operations for external systems.
Verifier List Service : This is the service used to list all Verifier defined for a bank.
Input Fields description
bankName:The Bank name corresponding to the logged in Bank Org Id. systemName: Name of available system from master data. areaName: Name of area from master data corresponding to the selected system. numberOfVerifiers: Number of verifiers indicates that the bank/ system/area selected has how many verifiers that must be involved for a change to become active. rangeToAmount: The user keys in the maximum amount the range is limited to. rangeFromAmount: Initial amount the range starts from. rangeNumberOfVerifiers: Here in the field the user selects the number of verifiers for the corresponding range entered.
Input options:
Option1 Request:bankOrgId,systemName,areaName,changeStatus,startIndex and pageSize. Response:List of number of verifiers defined for the bank. Description:Number of verifiers List based on bankOrgId,systemName,areaName,changeStatus,startIndex and pageSize provided in input will be generated.
Option2 Request:bankOrgId,systemName,changeStatus,startIndex and pageSize. Response:List of number of verifiers defined for the bank. Description:Number of verifiers List based on bankOrgId,systemName,areaName,changeStatus,startIndex and pageSize provided in input will be generated.
Option3 Request:bankOrgId,changeStatus,startIndex and pageSize. Response:List of number of verifiers defined for the bank. Description:Number of verifiers List based on bankOrgId,changeStatus,startIndex and pageSize provided in input will be generated.
Response status codes: 0=OK. 3001=Start date should not be past date. 3034=Bank not found. 3074=Bank standard is In-Active 3100=End date should not be past date. 3103=End date should be greater than start date. 3088=Update should happen against the latest record. 3500=Already exists. 3600=Not found. 3700=Invalid Input. 4000=System Error. 6002=Active delete is not allowed. 14001=System name not found. 14002=Area name not found. 14003=Verifier type not found. 14004=System, Area and Task update not allowed. 14005=Verification Range Validation. 14006=Verification task name not found.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:import namespace="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:domain:verifier:v1_0"/> <xs:import namespace="urn:srv.pbd.fs.edb.com:domain:common:v1_0"/> <xs:element <xs:element name="numberOfVerifierListResponse" type="tns:numberOfVerifierListResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response for List NumberOfVerifier</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation>
